byline: Bob Moon, Sylvia Gross, Jeff Tyler, Steve Chiotakis, Sam Beard, Scott Tong, Jeremy Hobson, Mary Dooe, Julia Coronado and Karen Clark
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, December 12, 2011
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, December 12, 2011
description: Questions are being raised as to the economic future of England and the rest of Europe following Friday's summit. Demand for larger pickups is up, and Ford is discontinuing its Ranger line of smaller trucks. More and more young people are taking on full-time jobs as yoga instructors.
